Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: ...Lord of the Rings trilogy, if you see it back to back, it's really long. But it's good.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [off camera] Yeah, that's right.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Dunder Mifflin, this is Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Pam! It's Michael. Help me! I need help right now.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Michael, what's wrong?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm hurt, I have hurt myself. Oh my God!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Ok, wait wait wait wait...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ungh, this is not looking good Pam!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Michael, do you need me to call an ambulance?!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, I want you to pick me up.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Ok...

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: What's going on?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Wait a second, I thought you said that you were hurt.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I am hurt. I hurt my foot.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I'm sorry? Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [exasperated]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: What is going on?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I want to come to work. But I need you to come and pick me up. [Jim lunges across Pam's desk and puts Michael on speakerphone]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: OH GOD!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey, whoa, Michael...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh God!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: It's, okay, it's Jim. Just say again, uh, really loudly what happened.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: OK, buhhhh, I burned my foot very badly on my Foreman Grill and I now need someone to come and bring me into work.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You burned your foot on a Foreman Grill?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I enjoy having breakfast in bed. I like waking up to the smell of bacon, sue me. And since I don't have a butler, I have to do it myself. So, most nights before I go to bed, I will lay six strips of bacon out on my George Foreman Grill. Then I go to sleep. When I wake up, I plug in the grill, I go back to sleep again. Then I wake up to the smell of crackling bacon. It is delicious, it's good for me. It's the perfect way to start the day. Today I got up, I stepped onto the grill and it clamped down on my foot... that's it. I don't see what's so hard to believe about that.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Pam, could you come get me?!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Uh, I have to stay here and answer the phone.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ok, could someone come and get me please, Ryan?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Michael, you should stay home and rest.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: There's no toilet paper here. Could Ryan... tell Ryan to bring toilet paper. Could you tell 'em that?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Can you hop?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I tried hopping, Kevin, and I bumped my elbow against the wall and now my elbow has a protruberance.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [panicked] No one wants to pick me up!?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [silence, Dwight enters the office] What is going on? What is going on?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Michael, is, um, sick and he wants one of us to rescue him.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm not sick! I'm burned!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm coming Michael!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm gonna save you!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Don't... is that Dwight? I do not want Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hold on Michael! I am coming! Wait there!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I don't want Dwight!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Michael, why don't you call your girlfriend?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I don't have a girlfriend.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: But you said that you went out with her this weekend.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It was all made up. Just someone come, ok? Anyone. Anyone but Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [sounds of a car crash] What was that...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: What was that?! [everyone runs to Michael's office window]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Ohhhhhh!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: He hit the pole!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: It's broken right, he can't...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh my gosh.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh Dwight, Dwight, [Dwight pukes on his back windshield] Ohhhhhh!

Quote.Speaker: Jim and Pam
Quote.Text: Oh my God!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Is he ok?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: He's still driving... Dwight, you forgot your bumper!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hellooo? ... Please don't send Dwight!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Morning everyone. Don't freak out. I forbid anybody to freak out. Clearly, I have had a very serious accident, but I will recover, God willing. I just want to be treated normally today. Normal would actually be good, considering the trauma that I've been through.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You missed two big conference calls today, one with corporate.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Did you explain why?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No, I didn't mention that you cooked your foot.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Burned my foot, Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Please stop popping my cast. Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: So, where are you shipping your foot?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ha ha ha. So where are you shipping...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Your foot?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Thank you. Pam, messages please?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You didn't have any.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Really, well, it, uh, seemed very important to you earlier that you needed to stay and...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: And do my job?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, your job is being my friend, Pam. OW! God!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [holding mini-fan] It slipped.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Sorry.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: It's just that before, you said that you didn't want any special treatment.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I don't want any special treatment, Pam. I just want you to treat me like you would some family member who's undergone some sort of serious physical trauma. I don't think that's too much to ask.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Do you want some aspirin, because you seem a little fussy.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, I don't want some aspirin, yeah I'm a little fussy. Aspirin's not gonna do a damn thing. I'm sitting here with a bloody stump of a foot.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hey, Pam, I'm assistant regional manager, and I can take care of him. Part of my duties are to.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What? Part of your duties are to what?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You just said "part of your duties are to" something.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, I didn't.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes, you did. What is wrong with you?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What is wrong with you?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Where is my cornbread?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Here you go.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Thank you. Did you get all dark meat like I like?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Yes. I ordered three full rotisserie chickens worth of all dark meat.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Where are the yams?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: They were out of yams. I got you creamed spinach.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Did you go to the one in Stroudsburg?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And they had no yams?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: They had no yams.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: How strange. Because they always have yams.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Aw, man, is that a Prism Duro-Sport?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You've seen one of these?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah, they're like an i-Pod only they're better 'cause they're chunkier and more solid.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Roy gave it to me for Christmas. I'm trying to figure out how to put songs on it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, no no no. Don't go there. I know this Russian website where you can download songs for two cents a piece.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah, I'll write down the address for you. Only, the only thing is, is that all the songs are in Russian. ... Kidding!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh! Ha, haha.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Why would they all be...? Ok, see you later, Pan.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Pan?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Pam... PAAAM!?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh, God.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [phone rings] What.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Come here please.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Tell me before I come there.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I want you to rub butter on my foot.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Pam, please? I have Country Crock.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Uh, ow. Ryan! ... Ryaaaaan ... RYYYYAN!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: These covers are totally indestructible.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah. Throw it. I promise it won't break. Chuck it. [Pam throws her mp3 player]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh no, it's broken.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: What?!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, it's fine. I told you it wouldn't break. You could throw it all day long.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: That is so cool. Thanks Dwight!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yep.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: So, I guess Pam and Dwight are friends now.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh God no, Dwight isn't my friend... Oh my God! Dwight's kind of my friend!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, nope, no one is helping me out at all Mom. No, I'm not gonna call Jan. She'd just worry... drive down here and make a big thing... Who told you that? No, it was mutual. What is Pam doing chatting with you?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Huh. Do you like candy?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: It's alright.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Cause you're sweeter than candy.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: What is wrong with you? [Dwight pats Angela on the rear and runs away laughing]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Hey!

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Wow, you just dive right into it.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: You know, around age twelve, I just started goin' for it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [loud noise in bathroom] No! Guh! OW! Awww, help, help me!

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: What, what happened?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I fell off the toilet. I'm caught between the toilet and the wall.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: What do you need?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ugh, not you. Someone else. Get Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: I don't think Pam's gonna want to come into the men's room.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Get Ryan. He needs to lift me. [Ryan shakes his head] and he needs to clean me up a little bit. Bring a wet towel.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Ryan, is, uh, dead.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, he's not.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Dead.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I just saw him.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: No. Can't, can't you just get up yourself? I... You only grilled your foot.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ugh, forget it. I'll just get up myself. No! Uh, aaaahhh! Ah! Oh God!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Do you think Dwight's bein' a little weird today?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No, he's actually been really nice and helpful.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: And that isn't weird?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Wow...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Can I have everyone's attention please? Phyllis, Oscar, Ryan, who's supposed to be dead, can I ask you all a question? Do you all know what it's like to be disabled? Oscar?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Um, I had scoliosis as a girl.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, never heard of it. No, a real disability, not a woman's trouble.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: When I was a teenager, I was in an iron lung.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Wuh, how, how old are you? Look, the point is, I am the only one here who has a legitimate disability, although I'm sure Stanley has had his fair share of obstacles.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: I'm not disabled and neither are you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ok, [lifts up cooked foot] what does this look like to you Stanley?!

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Mailboxes, Etc.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Shuuut it, ok, well, well you know what, disabilities are not things to be laughed at or laughed about. You people are jerks. Imagine if you had left Stevie Wonder on the floor of that bathroom instead of me.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Oh, we wouldn't. We love Stevie Wonder.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [sigh] I burned my foot!!! Ok, twenty minutes, conference room, everybody's in there!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [looking up at Creed] Dad?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: While we are waiting for our special guest to arrive, I wanted you all to take a look at a few of the many, many disabled icons who have contributed so much to our society.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Quick question: uh, why is Tom Hanks on the wall?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Twice.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Good question. Forrest Gump: mentally challenged, Philadelphia [points to a picture from Big]:

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I want to clamp Michael's face in a George Foreman grill.

Quote.Speaker: Billy Merchant
Quote.Text: So, there are just a couple things I want to remind everybody of...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ok...

Quote.Speaker: Billy Merchant
Quote.Text: First is parking. You can't block the freight entrance with your car, even if your blinkers are on. Does anybody have any questions? [to Dwight, whose arms is raised] Yes. Yeah? yes...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Dwight, you have your hand up.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ignore him. You know what? We're not that different, you and I. When I clamped my foot into a non-stick...

Quote.Speaker: Billy Merchant
Quote.Text: You know what Michael?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah...

Quote.Speaker: Billy Merchant
Quote.Text: Let me stop you right there.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ok.

Quote.Speaker: Billy Merchant
Quote.Text: And leave.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Did you see Born on the Fourth of July? I was under the impression that Billy would be more like that guy.

Quote.Speaker: Billy Merchant
Quote.Text: What's wrong with that guy?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You mean today? He stepped on a George Foremen grill and he burned his foot.

Quote.Speaker: Billy Merchant
Quote.Text: No, not Michael. The moon-faced kid who crashed into the pole. He looks like he has a concussion.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [popping his bubble wrap cast] Hey!

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: I found the pudding cups you wanted in a gas station in Carbondale!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You did it! Look at you, and with the plate and the napkin. Very nice. Thank you, Ryan.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: You are very welcome.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Did you get the yams?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: No, the gas station in Carbondale did not have fresh yams!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [sigh] Ok, I'll just have the pudding.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: You sure?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeh.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Ok.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know what? I feel better. Ryan brought me some chocolate pudding and his kindness healed my foot.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, baby, I am feelin' better. My body's literally healing itself. It is amazing what the human body is capable of when you have a powerful brain.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: I ground up four extra-strength aspirin and put them in Michael's pudding. I do the same thing with my dog to get him to take his heartworm medicine.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Uh, finally feel the blood coursing through my foot veins.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [hits his head on his desk] Uh, ugh, ohhhh...

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Uh, ok, I think we need to take him to the hospital because I'm pretty sure he has a concussion.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, now you feel some compassion for him.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: He needs to go right now, and you're his emergency contact. I think that you should go with him.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Why don't you go with him?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I, barely know him...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I want Michael to take me...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I can't take you, I don't have my car and yours is all vomity.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: You can take my van!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, ok, that's, great. No, I can't drive. Jim why don't you drive.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Fine.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We'll go. I'm still recovering. So let's just, Ryan, could you get my coat please.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Slowly, slowly. Let's just get to the elevator.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Choo choo choo choo choo choo...

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: What are you doing? What, stop...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Vietnam sounds.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [Dwight falls onto the couch] Stop, stop, stop, stop.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Tired... [Jim grabs spray bottle from planter]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You can't lay down.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Want to take a rake... .

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Wake up. [sprays Dwight]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ahh!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Dwight, here, let me help you Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I'm just gonna get...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ok, Pam, thanks.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Get up, get up.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You're the best.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Just keep him awake.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: It smells like chicken soup.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I know.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I have to go to the hospital.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I know.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Where we going?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I just want to say goodbye ok?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'll be back, I mean...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yes, I know, but it's gonna be different.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Why?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: It's just hard to explain.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Aw, Pam, you're adorable [taps her nose]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh my goodness!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [giggles]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Come here.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, huggy hugs.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Shotgun!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You don't think you should sit in the back with Dwight?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: The rules of shotgun are very simple and very clear. The first person to shout "shotgun" when you're within the sight of the car gets the front seat. That's how the game's played. There are no exceptions for someone with a concussion.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, God, a mini-van. What is Meredith's problem?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Well, I think she has a kid.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well, yeah she has one kid, no husband. She's not gonna find one driving this thing around.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Where are we going?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Come on, get inside.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Where are we going?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: We're going to Chuck E. Cheese.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Chuck E. Cheese? Oh, God, I'm so sick of Chuck E. Cheese.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: We're going to the hospital, Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I know, just sayin'.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Dwight, what are you drinking?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I found it under the seat.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh my God, Dwight, put that down.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm thirsty.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Give the bottle to Michael [sprays Dwight]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Give the bottle to Michael!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm thirsty!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Give it to me.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Dwight... [to Jim] You just keep your eyes on the road. [to Dwight] Give me the bottle or you're fired.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You can't fire me, I don't work in this van!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Give it to me Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No. [takes a drink]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Give me the bottle!!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [to Michael] Will you stop?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Gimme the bottle, Dwight!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Michael stop.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [drinks] Mmmmm...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Just give it!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Michael stop. [sprays Michael, then Dwight]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Stop, stop it! Stop spraying! [Dwight whines] Gimme the bottle!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Stop [sprays Michael]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: My eyes!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Stop spraying me! Gimme the bottle!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: My eyes!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Dwight, what is your middle name.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Danger.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [sigh] Something with a "K".

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: It's Kurt. Wow, I am so sad that I know that.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What do I write under "reason for visit"?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Concussion. [Michael scribbles something out] What did you write?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Nothing. I wrote "bringing someone to the hospital".

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: So you thought they meant your reason for coming to the hospital.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No... you know what Jim, this isn't about me anymore. I made a miraculous recovery, which is more than I can say for him. [Dwight falls towards Jim]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Come on Dwight. [sprays Dwight]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hi Michael!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hi Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ahhh. Mweehaa

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Doctor, what is more serious, a head injury or a foot injury?

Quote.Speaker: Doctor
Quote.Text: A head injury.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well, you don't have all the information. The foot as been fairly severely burned and healed quickly, very quickly, actually like suspiciously quickly.

Quote.Speaker: Doctor
Quote.Text: [to Dwight] So, I'm ordering a CAT scan.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What is that?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Look since you have the machine up and running, can I just stick my foot, we take a look?

Quote.Speaker: Doctor
Quote.Text: Well, for a burn, you really just need to look at the outside of the foot.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ok, what kinda machine is that?

Quote.Speaker: Doctor
Quote.Text: Does the skin look red and swollen?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That's what she said.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's my joke, damnit Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Lab Tech
Quote.Text: Ok, no electronics past this point. Camera, sound equipment...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It's ok, they're with me.

Quote.Speaker: Lab Tech
Quote.Text: No metal of any kind.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Alright, well, I guess this is where we leave you off.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I don't want to do this.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Uh, well you should of thought of before you crashed your head on your way to pick me up. We'll, see you when you get out.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Fine. Fine.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Dunder Mifflin, this is Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Dunder Mifflin, this is Jim.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh my God, what is going on, is Dwight ok?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Uh hmm, he should be fine, but, uh, they brought him in for a CAT scan.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I can't believe he's getting a CAT scan.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Michael went in there with him too. It's pretty sweet.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Really? Michael went in with him?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Uh huh.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Wow.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: But they shouldn't be much longer now, so we'll be back soon.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Ok, that's uh, good news [Pam sees Angela eavesdropping] Uh, yeah, no I'll let you go.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Ok.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Ok. Bye.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Bye.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey, Oscar?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: What's up, Pam?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I just wanted to let you that Dwight's gonna be ok. The doctor said there's a really simple treatment for a concussion, so he'll probably even be back at work tomorrow.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Ok...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I just, uh, thought you'd want to know that.

Quote.Speaker: Lab Tech
Quote.Text: Ok Mr. Schrute, inhale with me on three. One, two, uh Sir? [Michael tries to put his leg in the scanner] Stop that. Stop. Stop that.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [Jim popping Michael's bubble wrap cast] You should put butter on it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Uh, that's what she said. See, haven't lost my sense of humor. No, no need, it was a non-stick grill.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I've had a Foreman grill for about six years, I've done about 85% of my cooking on it, but I've never burnt myself, probably because I don't use it as a pillow.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I always keep a stash of bubble wrap at my house. Some days, hectic, tiring days, I just like to go home and zone out and click on the tube and pop a few. Very soothing. [to the interviewer] Want to try?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You know, that's probably not gonna last too long, you should go to a hospital and get a real cast.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Right, I'm gonna spend the day in the hospital, bujehh. Bureaucracy and germs.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: And doctors.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes, so, no thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Pssht.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Constructing a home-made cast? Genius. Filled with foresight. Like in the pioneer times, if you lost a leg, they would then use the bone of the leg for a cane. They wasted nothing.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Wow, I don't want to hear... you talk. Pam, could I have a word with you in my office? [stumbling] Oh, oh, oh. Alright.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: My assignment is to make a temporary disabled parking permit for Michael Scott.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Ooo! Who made popcorn? [Michael rubbing butter on his foot]

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: [on speakerphone] Well you know, frankly a lot of us have been saying this for a long time.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, I've been sayin that.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Yeah, and I, uh, I think that the very fact that we're including it in our agenda frankly, is a big step forward.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Did you know I used to be in HR?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: I'm sorry?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I used to be in HR. I was a Hell raiser.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Uh, ok.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Right? [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Uh, great. Why don't we move on?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Alright. Movin' on.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Great. Because you that I think the very fact that [Michael mutes the call]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ry-an. You're here. Whatcha got, whatcha got? Alright, Panic Room, Maverick, Nell, Sommersby, The Accused. Where's Little Man Tate?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: They were out.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh come on.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: At three different places.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh man. It's not a Jodie Foster afternoon without Little Man Tate, buddy.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Mmm, I'm telling you the best cure in the world is comfort food. You know how they say "stuff a cold"? Well I don't care you've got, the flu, Lyme disease, emphysema, you eat an entire dark meat chicken, you can walk on the moon.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Look, I feel fine. As a volunteer sheriff's deputy I have been trained to notice all the signs of a concussion. One of them is slurred speech, ok? Number three, shortness of breath. There are four things you have to remember. One:

Quote.Speaker: Doctor
Quote.Text: We need to get your friend into the CT machine.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Into a machine?! Ok. Uh, that's bad, will you stay with me?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ok, will you please call my cousin Mose?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, I'm not calling your weirdo cousin. Twenty-seven years old, never left the beet farm.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh God. Oh God.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Guh-od.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh God.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ok, I'll stand near you.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Next to me?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Next-ish.

Quote.Speaker: None
Quote.Text: [Spanish language telenovela dialogue from the waiting room T.V.]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I'm gonna pull the car around.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Shh shh shh shh.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Do you speak Spanish?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No. Do you?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No, I don't.
